FuncDef: The display vrrp bfd session command displays information about VRID-based dynamic BFD sessions. The display vrrp bfd session command displays information about VRID-based dynamic BFD sessions.
CLIs: display vrrp bfd session { all | interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } vrid <virtual-router-id> }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about all VRID-based dynamic BFD sessions.
-

Displays information about a VRID-based dynamic BFD session on a specified interface.
-

Displays information about a dynamic BFD session based on a specified VRID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.
